content.question: An electron travels through a uniform magnetic field <math> <mrow> <mover> <mi>B</mi> <mo>→</mo> </mover> </mrow> </math> directed to the right. The electron’s velocity <math> <mrow> <mover> <mi>v</mi> <mo>→</mo> </mover> </mrow> </math> is directed out of the page, as shown in the figure above. The direction of the force on the electron due to the magnetic field at the instant shown is

choices.label: toward the top of the page
toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
